game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: In this quest, you will embark on an adventurous journey to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient civilization. The treasure is said to be hidden deep within a treacherous jungle, guarded by mythical creatures and traps. Are you ready to take on this challenge and claim the riches?
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, a rare artifact, and eternal fame

task.description: Your first task is to find a map that leads to the hidden treasure. The map is rumored to be in possession of an old sage who resides in a secluded village.
